Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) transform the energy of the fuel instantly into electric energy with a large fuel option.
Titulo: Coal gas fuel utilization effects on electrolyte supported solide oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: Coal, which is a local energy source, is a preferred fuel despite its negative features because it is cheap and abundant.
Titulo: Coal gas fuel utilization effects on electrolyte supported solide oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: The use of coal and coal-based fuels in SOFCs has recently attracted considerable attention.
Titulo: Coal gas fuel utilization effects on electrolyte supported solide oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: In this study, performance analysis of the SOFC has been performed experimentally by using hydrogen, generator gas (contained 12% H-2), and water-gas (contained 50% H-2) in an electrolyte-supported SOFC (ES-SOFC).
Titulo: Coal gas fuel utilization effects on electrolyte supported solide oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: The numerical modelling of the fuel cell had been previously performed.
Titulo: Coal gas fuel utilization effects on electrolyte supported solide oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: In addition, the effect of inlet gas fuel flow rates on the ES-SOFC has been investigated numerically in this study.
Titulo: Coal gas fuel utilization effects on electrolyte supported solide oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: The temperature effect on the performance of ES-SOFC has been examined experimentally.
Titulo: Coal gas fuel utilization effects on electrolyte supported solide oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: It is seen that the performance of SOFCs fueled hydrogen is favorable than fueled water gas and generator gas.
Titulo: Coal gas fuel utilization effects on electrolyte supported solide oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: This is because of the higher hydrogen substance in the water gas measure against the other gas.
Titulo: Coal gas fuel utilization effects on electrolyte supported solide oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: In addition, it is seen that the increase in temperature increases the performance with positive effects on the reactions.
Titulo: Coal gas fuel utilization effects on electrolyte supported solide oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: It is also concluded that the performance of SOFC increases when inlet fuel flow rates increase.
